b:includable.b:tag: var exportify = { noTitle: "", postAuthor: , authorLabel: "", postDate: , dateLabel: "", postLabels: }

b:if.p: Please Select Embedded Mode To Show The Comment System.*

b:include.cond: data:view.isMultipleItems and not data:view.search.label and not data:view.search.query and not data:view.isArchive
b:include.name: inlineAd

b:tag.cond: data:post.author.aboutMe or (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "colorify-pro-related-posts") or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "colorify-pro-post-footer-ads")
b:tag.name: footer

b:if.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets.FeaturedPost any w => w.sectionId == "featured"))

data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "header-ads")) or (data:view.isPost and (data:skin.vars.headerad_onpost == "1px") and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "header-ads"))
data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "trending"))

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "home-ads"))
b:section.name: Home Ads

b:if.p: Please Select Embedded Mode To Show The Comment System.*

b:includable.b:tag: var exportify = { noTitle: "", postAuthor: , authorLabel: "", postDate: , dateLabel: "", postLabels: }

b:include.cond: data:view.isMultipleItems and not data:view.search.label and not data:view.search.query and not data:view.isArchive
b:include.name: inlineAd

b:tag.cond: data:post.author.aboutMe or (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "colorify-pro-related-posts") or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "colorify-pro-post-footer-ads")
b:tag.name: footer

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isPost and (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "colorify-pro-related-posts"))
b:section.name: Related Posts

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isPost and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "colorify-pro-post-footer-ads"))
b:section.name: Post ADS 3

b:if.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isSingleItem and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "sidebar"))

data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "footer-ads")) or (data:view.isPost and (data:skin.vars.footerad_onpost == "1px") and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "footer-ads"))
